column2: "Hom nyi EWURADZE ayɛw; Na oye dɛ wɔtow ayɛyindwom ma hɛn Nyankopɔn; Na ɔyɛ enyigye
"EWURADZE na ɔkyekyer Jerusalɛm; Ɔno na ɔpon Israelfo a wɔapetse boa ano."
"Ɔsa hɔn a hɔn akoma ebubu yarba
"Ɔkyerɛ nworaba hɔn dodow ano; Ɔtoto hɔn nyinara edzin."

column3: na tum mu ɔkatakyi; Ne ntseasee nnyi mbanano."

column2: "EWURADZE wowaw abrɛfo: Ɔno na ɔdze emumuyɛfo hwe famu."
"Hom mfa ndaase ntow ndwom mma EWURADZE; Hom ntow ayɛyindwom wɔ nsankutsen do mma hɛn Nyankopɔn:"

column3: Ɔno a osiesie nyankom ma asaase
column4: Ɔno a ɔma nkyɛkyɛr fifir mbepɔw do."

column2: "N’enyi nngye ɔpɔnkɔ n’ahoɔdzen mu: Onnya enyigye wɔ ɔdasanyi n’akokodur ho."
"EWURADZE n’enyi gye hɔn a wosuro no no mu; Hɔn a hɔn enyi da no mbɔbɔrhu do no mu."
"Na ɔahyɛ w’aponkɛse n’adaban no dzen; Oehyira wo mba a wɔwɔ wo mu."
"Ɔma wo ntoaado dwe; Ɔdze ewifua pa mee wo."
"Ɔsoma ne mbrasɛm ba asaase do; N’asɛm tu mbirika harhar."
"Ɔma esukwankyɛba dɛ kuntu fufuw; Ɔpetse ɔbɔsu daa dɛ nso
column4: "Ɔtow n’esubo gu dɛ ntrɔma: Woana botum n’awɔw enyim gyina?"

column3: na ɔnan hɔn: Ɔma ne mframa bɔ
Ne mbra na n’atsɛmbu kyerɛ Israel."

column2: "Ɔnnye ɔman biara nndzii no dɛm da: Na n’atsɛmbu dze
